lead_paragraph: A woman at the center of a legal dispute with her former partner defied a court order to give up custody of her 7-year-old daughter on Friday, a lawyer said.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A woman at the center of a legal dispute with her former partner defied a court order to give up custody of her 7-year-old daughter on Friday, a lawyer said.

headline.main: Birth Mother Defies Order to Give Child to Ex-Partner
headline.print_headline: Birth Mother Defies Order To Give Child to Ex-Partner
